name: PlayStation Portable Resource File
summary: Learn about .RCO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: One commonly edited RCO file is topmenu_plugin.rco, which contains the main menu and submenu XMB icons and text. RCO files are located in the flash0:/​vsh/​resource directory on a PSP flash card.

description: File used by the PlayStation Portable (PSP), a gaming device developed by Sony; contains resources for the PSP, including system information, sounds, icons, and other theme graphics; commonly used to customize the look and feel of the PSP interface.
